alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 27 at 3:56AM PDT until March 28 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT THIS MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 33 will result in frost formation. For the Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...North Bay Interior Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 PM Monday to 11 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds are expected for the higher elevations of the North Bay interior mountains. Localized areas could see gusts greater than 45 mph.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
